name: Exterminator
description: Enjoy the world of a Japanese Game Show through an arcade experience! Punch the mouse coming from pipes to earn points. Anyone can enjoy a refreshing experience playing Exterminator!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: １ GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz 4.00GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1080 Storage: 1 GB available space
